NSInteger count
 The maximum number of results to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return the maximum number permitted by the server.

Detailed Description

A random word request.

Fetches one or more random words from the Wordnik API.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) init

Initialize a random word request.

Any word from the Wordnik corpus -- with or without a dictionary definition -- will be returned.

+ (id) request

Create and initialize a random word request.

Any word from the Wordnik corpus -- with or without a dictionary definition -- will be returned.

+ (id) requestWordsWithParameters: (NSInteger)  count
includePartOfSpeech: (NSString*)  includePartOfSpeech
excludePartOfSpeech: (NSString*)  excludePartOfSpeech
minCorpusCount: (NSInteger)  minCorpusCount
maxCorpusCount: (NSInteger)  maxCorpusCount
minDictionaryCount: (NSInteger)  minDictionaryCount
maxDictionaryCount: (NSInteger)  maxDictionaryCount
minLength: (NSInteger)  minLength
maxLength: (NSInteger)  maxLength 

Create and initialize a random words request.

Parameters:
countThe maximum number of words to return
includePartOfSpeechA CSV list of parts of speech that words in the result must match
excludePartOfSpeechA CSV list of parts of speech that words must not match
minCorpusCountThe minimum number of times this word must appear in the Wordnik corpus
maxCorpusCountThe maximum number of times this word must appear in the Wordnik corpus
minLengthThe minimum number of characters the word must contain
maxLengthThe maximum number of characters the word must contain

Property Documentation

- (NSInteger) count [read, assign]

The maximum number of results to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return the maximum number permitted by the server.
